member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether row and column totals should be displayed before or after regular data rows and columns.
member.remarks: If this value is set to true, total rows appear above data rows and total columns appear on the left of regular data columns.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the Olap output table should use zeros to indicate the missing values.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Olap.PivotEngine.DefaultFilterType
member.summary: Gets or sets the default filter type (by value or by condition). When binding the service, only FilterType.Condition and FilterType.None are supported. When FilterType.Both is set, it works as FilterType.Condition. When FilterType.Value is set, it works as FilterType.None.

member.summary: Gets the list of the objects which can be used in the view.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether view updates should be generated asynchronously.
member.remarks: This property is set to true by default, so summaries over large data sets are performed asynchronously to prevent stopping the UI thread.

member.summary: Gets or sets the current pivot view definition as a JSON string.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Olap.PivotEngine.ServerTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum amount of time, in milliseconds, which the engine should wait for the results to come back from the server. The default value for this property is 60000, equivalent to sixty seconds. If you expect server operations to take longer than that to complete, set the property to a higher value.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Olap.PivotEngine.ServerPollInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time, in milliseconds, which the engine should wait before polling the server for progress status while retrieving results. The default value for this property is 500, which causes the engine to poll the server for a status update every half second.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Olap.PivotEngine.ServerMaxDetail
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of records when getting the detail data from the server. The default value for this property is 1000, which provides a reasonable amount of detail in many scenarios. If you want to allow more detail records to be retrieved, increase the value of this property.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Olap.PivotEngine.CubeService
member.summary: Gets the options for OLAP cube provided by SSAS server.
member.remarks: Sets this property allows the PivotEngine to connect directly to OLAP cubes provided by SSAS servers.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Olap.PivotEngine.SortableGroups
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the engine should sort groups when sorting the value fields (measures) or whether it should keep the group order and the data only within each group.
member.remarks: It works when the SubTotals are included.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Olap.PivotEngine.SortOnServer
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the summary data received from the server is already sorted.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Olap.PivotEngine.ExclusiveValueSearch
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the filter should include only values selected by the @see:wijmo.grid.filter.ValueFilter.filterText property.
member.remarks: This property is set to true by default, which matches Excel's behavior.

member.name: P:C1.Web.Mvc.Olap.PivotEngine.UniqueId
member.summary: Gets a value which represents the unique id for the control.

member.summary: Configurates . Sets the default filter type (by value or by condition). When binding the service, only FilterType.Condition and FilterType.None are supported. When FilterType.Both is set, it works as FilterType.Condition. When FilterType.Value is set, it works as FilterType.None.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Olap.Fluent.PivotEngineBuilder.ServerTimeout(System.Int32)
member.summary: Configurates . Sets the maximum amount of time, in milliseconds, which the engine should wait for the results to come back from the server. The default value for this property is 60000, equivalent to sixty seconds. If you expect server operations to take longer than that to complete, set the property to a higher value.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Olap.Fluent.PivotEngineBuilder.ServerPollInterval(System.Int32)
member.summary: Configurates . Sets the amount of time, in milliseconds, which the engine should wait before polling the server for progress status while retrieving results. The default value for this property is 500, which causes the engine to poll the server for a status update every half second.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Olap.Fluent.PivotEngineBuilder.ServerMaxDetail(System.Int32)
member.summary: Configurates . Sets the maximum number of records when getting the detail data from the server. The default value for this property is 1000, which provides a reasonable amount of detail in many scenarios. If you want to allow more detail records to be retrieved, increase the value of this property.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Olap.Fluent.PivotEngineBuilder.SortableGroups(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Configurates . Sets a value that determines whether the engine should sort groups when sorting the value fields (measures) or whether it should keep the group order and the data only within each group.
member.remarks: It works when the SubTotals are included.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Olap.Fluent.PivotEngineBuilder.SortOnServer(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Configurates . Sets a value that indicates whether the summary data received from the server is already sorted.

member.name: M:C1.Web.Mvc.Olap.Fluent.PivotEngineBuilder.ExclusiveValueSearch(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Configurates . Sets a value that determines whether the filter should include only values selected by the @see:wijmo.grid.filter.ValueFilter.filterText property.
member.remarks: This property is set to true by default, which matches Excel's behavior.
